latest_revision.text:
This page is for brainstorming changes and enhancements to the website.
== Front Page Information ==
Relevant information that should always be visible on the front page: 
* Upcoming Events/Meetings (EventCal?)
* Headline section outlining HeatSync Labs and the charter
* Polls (Google Docs)

== Backend ==
* Canonical urls
* Additional Data fields in profiles (Twitter, City, Membership Level, etc)
* Discussion forum platform (possible unified login with wordpress or wiki)
